text.title: Motopia’s 10 Day – Drive on us policy

descProblem.paragraph: At Motopia, our mission is to offer a superior online experience with full transparency, at exceptionally low prices. After all what is the purpose of buying a used vehicle, if you cannot save money? We keep our cost low and pass on the savings to you!

We, realize that purchasing a vehicle online may present some doubts. This is why we offer a 10 day test drive on us policy on all vehicles sold with more than 5,000 miles. You have 10 days drive your car on us. If you don’t love it for any reason, return it for a full refund. No questions asked.
